1. The human interaction aspects related to the process execution.
2. The project management aspects related to the process execution.
3. The process quality assurance policy.
4. The process standards.
5. The process model layout design regarding its phases, inputs, deliveries, flow, iteration, and feedbacks (see section 7.1).
6. The defined process objectives
7. The justification of data mining technique selection.
8. The acclimatised data.
9. The data mining model.
10. The model evaluation report.
11. The presented knowledge.
